attributes.action: Stop ALL foreign aid until such time as the taxpayers of the UK do not face an ever increasing tax burden and the country is solvent again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should suspend all aid payments whilst so many people in this country are struggling to survive due to ever increasing taxes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
